title: Lagging, but no high ping
body: I just played a game and literally had this issue the entire game. My ping and FPS stayed at their normal range (60) but I would randomly stop in place for about 10 seconds or just lose control of my character. Typing in chat, recalling and pinging would have a 10+ second delay, all of this with my ping and FPS staying normal. Anyone else with this issue recently?  Any solution for this?  I already reset my router and other games work fine.

replies.body:
This almost perfectly describes something known as packet loss. If bits of the data going between our servers and your network gets lost along the way, it can cause all kinds of weird stuff like rubberbanding, champs just ignoring your orders, or even huge delays in commands. 

We can verify this pretty easily, grab your most recent game logs that gave you trouble and pop it into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Take a screenshot or let me know what it says otherwise, and we can go from there.
here is logs for the two games i had this in but it also happened once in client http://imgur.com/a/YKZ2P

After looking at those logs, it definitely looks like you're having some packet loss issues as well. Go ahead and take those logs and shoot them to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they may be able to help out!
I got an "Unknown Error Contact support if you continue to have this problem" message a few minutes ago after having a really glitchy game. Hope it clears up (my connection was fine)

this perfectly describes whats been happening to me today it happened once in two different games and once while in the client. I ran a 10 minute ping test and had 0% packet loss though and discord and the minecraft servers I host from my network had no issues at that time.
